actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Sikh nation should be allowed to exercise the right of self-determination for the independence of their homeland, Punjab, Khalistan.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) the Sikhs of Khalistan have the right to self-determination and should be allowed to exercise this right by pursuing the independence of their homeland, Punjab, Khalistan; and (2) the United Nations should hold a plebiscite in the Sikh homeland so that Sikhs can determine their own political future.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Sikh nation should be allowed to exercise the right of self-determination for the independence of their homeland, Punjab, Khalistan.
